name: test_1210_View_All_Communities
description:
Test that an admin can view all communities from the CMS.

Test Steps:
1. Launch the browser
2. Login as admin user
3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
4. Verify visibility of all community groups
5. Check each community individually (Pregnant, Trying to Conceive, Postpartum)
descriptionHtml:
Test that an admin can view all communities from the CMS.

Test Steps:

  1. Launch the browser
  2. Login as admin user
  3. Navigate to Postpartum community page
  4. Verify visibility of all community groups
  5. Check each community individually (Pregnant, Trying to Conceive, Postpartum)

@allure.feature("12.0.0 CMS Communities") @allure.epic("Web CMS Testing") @allure.story("12.1.0 View All Communities") @allure.severity(allure.severity_level.NORMAL) @allure.description(""" Test that an admin can view all communities from the CMS. Test Steps: 1. Launch the browser 2. Login as admin user 3. Navigate to Postpartum community page 4. Verify visibility of all community groups 5. Check each community individually (Pregnant, Trying to Conceive, Postpartum) """) def test_1210_View_All_Communities(): with sync_playwright() as p: # Launch browser browser = p.chromium.launch() page = browser.new_page() # Login using the existing login class login_page = LoginPage(page) login_page.loginDev(admin_user, admin_pw) # Navigate to the Postpartum community page community_page = CommunityPage(page) community_page.go_to_postpartum_community() #
